languages.text: {n}Когда вы наклоняетесь над осколками, звон в ушах на мгновение усиливается. Тихий голос обещает вам силу и власть, просит спасти от забвения — и вы великодушно исполняете его просьбу. Самый крупный из осколков, оказавшись в ваших руках, умиротворенно затихает.{/n}

{n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда вы наклоняетесь над осколками, звон в ушах на мгновение усиливается. Тихий голос обещает вам силу и власть, просит спасти от забвения — и вы великодушно исполняете его просьбу. Самый крупный из осколков, оказавшись в ваших руках, умиротворенно затихает.{/n}

{n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du dich über die Splitter lehnst, wird das Läuten in deinen Ohren für einen Moment lauter. Eine leise Stimme verspricht dir Stärke und Macht und bittet dich, sie vor der Vergessenheit zu bewahren – und du erfüllst großmütig ihre Bitte. Sobald der größte Splitter in deinen Händen liegt, verstummt sie beruhigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich über die Splitter lehnst, wird das Läuten in deinen Ohren für einen Moment lauter. Eine leise Stimme verspricht dir Stärke und Macht und bittet dich, sie vor der Vergessenheit zu bewahren – und du erfüllst großmütig ihre Bitte. Sobald der größte Splitter in deinen Händen liegt, verstummt sie beruhigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que vous vous penchez sur les fragments, le sifflement dans vos oreilles s'intensifie subitement. Une voix douce vous demande de la sauver de l'oubli, en échange de quoi elle vous promet force et pouvoir, et vous accédez gracieusement à sa requête. Une fois le plus gros fragment entre vos mains, il s'abîme dans le silence, comme apaisé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que vous vous penchez sur les fragments, le sifflement dans vos oreilles s'intensifie subitement. Une voix douce vous demande de la sauver de l'oubli, en échange de quoi elle vous promet force et pouvoir, et vous accédez gracieusement à sa requête. Une fois le plus gros fragment entre vos mains, il s'abîme dans le silence, comme apaisé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你朝祭坛碎片俯下身时，你耳中的嗡嗡声立刻变得更响了。某个安静的声音响了起来，承诺会赐予你力量与权势，希望你能拯救它，让它免于湮灭的命运，而你仁慈地满足了它的请求。祭坛最大的那块碎片来到了你的手中，而碎片也安静下来，不再做声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你朝祭坛碎片俯下身时，你耳中的嗡嗡声立刻变得更响了。某个安静的声音响了起来，承诺会赐予你力量与权势，希望你能拯救它，让它免于湮灭的命运，而你仁慈地满足了它的请求。祭坛最大的那块碎片来到了你的手中，而碎片也安静下来，不再做声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando te inclinas sobre los fragmentos, el pitido se intensifica durante un momento. Una voz queda te promete fuerza y poder a cambio de salvarla del olvido, y tú aceptas amablemente. Al recoger el mayor de los fragmentos, guarda silencio, satisfecho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando te inclinas sobre los fragmentos, el pitido se intensifica durante un momento. Una voz queda te promete fuerza y poder a cambio de salvarla del olvido, y tú aceptas amablemente. Al recoger el mayor de los fragmentos, guarda silencio, satisfecho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}破片に向かって身をかがめると、耳鳴りが一瞬強くなった。かすかな声が力と強さを約束し、忘却から救ってほしいと願う。あなたはその願いを快く受け入れた。最大の破片が手に収まると、それは静かになり、落ち着きを取り戻した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}破片に向かって身をかがめると、耳鳴りが一瞬強くなった。かすかな声が力と強さを約束し、忘却から救ってほしいと願う。あなたはその願いを快く受け入れた。最大の破片が手に収まると、それは静かになり、落ち着きを取り戻した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parçaların üzerine eğildiğin sırada kulaklarındaki çınlama bir anlığına şiddetleniyor. Kısık bir ses, sana güç ve kudret vadederek onu unutulmaktan kurtarmanı istiyor. Sen de bu isteği lütufkâr bir şekilde yerine getiriyorsun. En büyük parçayı eline almanla birlikte bu ses yatışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you lean over the shards, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. A quiet voice promises you strength and power, asks you to save it from oblivion, and you graciously fulfil its request. Once the largest of the shards is in your hands, it falls silent, pacified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parçaların üzerine eğildiğin sırada kulaklarındaki çınlama bir anlığına şiddetlenir. Kısık bir ses, sana güç ve kudret vadederek onu unutulmaktan kurtarmanı ister ve sen de bu isteği lütufkâr bir şekilde yerine getirirsin. En büyük parçayı eline almanla birlikte bu ses yatışır.{/n}
